--- title: "1. Introduction to
Data Science" subtitle: "Practical Insight: Doing Data Science in Education with R" author: ผศ.ดร.สิวะโชติ ศรีสุทธิยากร logo: "images/logo.png" footer: "Practical Insight: Doing Data Science in Education with R" format: revealjs: theme: slides.scss multiplex: true transition: slide slide-number: true navigation-mode: vertical scrollable: true chalkboard: true in_header: style.css menu: numbers: true slide-tone: false editor: visual execute: freeze: auto --- # What is Data Science? ## What is Data Sciene? {.smaller} Data Science is the study of the generalizable extraction of knowledge from data.
![](images/ds.png){width="90%"}
https://www.wuestpartner.com/tachyon/sites/10/2021/12/Blog_190227_DE_datashift_data_science.png ## Data Insight {.smaller} Data Science is the study of the generalizable extraction of knowledge from data.
![](images/insight.png){width="80%"}
## Data Insight {.smaller}
![](images/insight2.png){width="80%"}
## Types of Data Analytics {.smaller}
![](images/analytictypes.png){width="80%"}
https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:902/1\*vBkth1ZSveUyXuQ7pDym9Q.png ## Example ::: columns ::: {.column width="50%"} ![](images/ach.png){width="80%"} ![](images/diag.png) ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ![](images/modelling.png){width="100%"} ::: ::: # Data Science in Education ## Data Science in Education {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Criteria Learning_Analytics Academic_Analytics Policy_Analytics
Focus Individual learner's educational process Institution-wide educational processes Education policy and its social/economic impact
Primary Users Learners, instructors, educational practitioners Educational institutions, administrators, academic officers Policy makers, government agencies, education authorities
Data Sources Learning management systems (LMS), online interactive platforms, educational applications Institutional databases, student information systems, academic performance data Large-scale educational data sets, government and institutional reports, public data sources
Main Objectives Improve educational outcomes, personalize learning experiences, identify learning difficulties Enhance academic program quality, optimize resource allocation, track institutional performance Inform and guide policy decisions, assess policy impacts, support strategic planning
````` ::: ::: ## Learning Analytics {.smaller} ![](images/LA.png){width="100%"} ## Academic Analytics {.smaller} ![](images/AA.png){width="60%"} ## Policy Analytics {.smaller} ![](images/PA.png){width="70%"} # Data Science Process - Data Science Process is a framework for solving problems using data science. - Data Science Process has 5 steps such as: - Problem/Context Understanding - Data Understanding and Collection - Data Preprocessing - Modeling & Evaluating - Deployment ## Data Science Process {.smaller} ![](images/ds_process.png){width="100%"}

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
